mapper.update: update mishu.`tb_comment_info` set related_id=#{relatedId} where pkid=#{pkid}
update mishu.`tb_reply_comment` set related_id=#{relatedId} where pkid=#{pkid}
update mishu_write.collec_notice set noticeId=#{snatchurlId} where id=#{collecId}
mapper.select: select ifnull(count(0),0) from mishu.`tb_comment_info` where related_id=#{id} and source=#{source}
select source from mishu.`tb_comment_info` group by source
SELECT related_id as relatedId,pkid FROM mishu.`tb_comment_info`
SELECT related_id as relatedId,pkid FROM mishu.`tb_reply_comment`
SELECT source FROM mishu.`tb_reply_comment` GROUP BY source

SELECT a.title,a.pkid AS mianPkid,b.id,c.`pkid` AS commentPkid FROM mishu.tb_reply_comment c JOIN biaodaa_admin.tb_nt_mian_${source} a ON c.`related_id`=a.`pkid` JOIN mishu.`snatchurl` b ON a.`title`=b.`title`
SELECT a.id AS snatchurlId,b.`id` AS collecId FROM mishu.snatchurl a JOIN mishu_write.collec_notice b ON a.`title`=b.`title`
